description: Manage commitment plans for Azure Cognitive Services accounts.

commands.name: az cognitiveservices account commitment-plan create
commands.summary: Create a commitment plan for Azure Cognitive Services account.
commands.syntax:
az cognitiveservices account commitment-plan create --auto-renew {false, true}
                                                    --commitment-plan-name
                                                    --hosting-model {ConnectedContainer, DisconnectedContainer, ProvisionedWeb, Web}
                                                    --name
                                                    --plan-type
                                                    --resource-group
                                                    [--current-count]
                                                    [--current-tier]
                                                    [--next-count]
                                                    [--next-tier]
examples: az cognitiveservices account commitment-plan create -g yuanyang-test-sdk -n yytest-ta --commitment-plan-name "plan" --hosting-model "Web" --plan-type "TA" --auto-renew false --current-tier "T1" --next-tier "T2"

commands.name: az cognitiveservices account commitment-plan delete
commands.summary: Delete a commitment plan from Azure Cognitive Services account.
examples: az cognitiveservices account commitment-plan delete -g yuanyang-test-sdk -n yytest-ta --commitment-plan-name "plan"

commands.name: az cognitiveservices account commitment-plan list
commands.summary: Show all commitment plans from Azure Cognitive Services account.
examples: az cognitiveservices account commitment-plan list -g yuanyang-test-sdk -n yytest-ta

commands.name: az cognitiveservices account commitment-plan show
commands.summary: Show a commitment plan from Azure Cognitive Services account.
examples: az cognitiveservices account commitment-plan show -g yuanyang-test-sdk -n yytest-ta --commitment-plan-name "plan"
